attributes.action: The funding model for the BBC is outdated and should be radically overhauled.
attributes.background: When the BBC was created it was the sole broadcasting body. As such it was not unreasonable for it to be funded by contributions by everybody who watched it. In the modern world with so varied a media availability the funding model can no longer be justified,and it should be radically overhauled.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like changes to the BBC funding model, but are not sure what changes you would like.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like the Government and Parliament to make. 

You might also like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231342
